news.title: ZOË FEDEROFF Posts Her Contract With CRADLE OF FILTH, Details How Little She Was Paid
news.summary: Former Cradle of Filth keyboardist/vocalist Zoë M. Federoff has broken her silence following her sudden mid-tour departure. She has released a blistering statement that lays bare the conditions she and her husband, Mr Federoff, faced.
